                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: দ্রুতি, কাজ, তাপমাত্রা, তাপ, বৈদ্যুতিক বিভব হলো অদিক বা স্কেলার রাশি।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৫]</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: যে ভেক্টরের মান শূন্য এবং যার কোনো নির্দিষ্ট দিক থাকে না, তাকে নাল বা শূন্য ভেক্টর বলে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৮]</p>
</span>

overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \vec{B}=4\hat{i}-2\hat{j}-2\hat{k} </script></span> ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-108"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-109"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-110"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-115"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-116"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-117"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.24em, 1007.5em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -0.654em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1003.28em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: 0.535em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.641em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.697em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 7.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \vec{A}.\vec{B}=0&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow\left(2\hat{i}+a\hat{j}+\hat{k}\right).\left(4\hat{i}-2\hat{j}-2\hat{k}\right)=0&nbsp;\\
\Rightarrow8-2a-2=0&nbsp;\\ 
\therefore a=3&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ভেক্টরকে সর্বোচ্চ কয়টি উপাংশে ভাগ করা যায়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দুটি&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তিনটি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ছয়টি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অসংখ্য</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি ভেক্টর যোগের বিনিময় সূত্র?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

position: relative; width: 0.685em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.64em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.278em; left: 0.139em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-215"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-216"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.324em; left: 0.184em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.324em; left: 0.184em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-227"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-228"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.278em; left: 0.139em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm \vec{P}+\vec{Q}=\vec{Q}+\vec{P} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৩]</p>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-277" style="width: 4.556em; position: relative; width: 0.731em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.64em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="width: 0.781em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm \vec{A}</script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-360"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-361"><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi id="MathJax-Span-478" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-479"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-480"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm \left(\hat{j}+\hat{k}\right)\times\hat{k}=\left(\hat{j}\times\hat{k}\right)+\left(\hat{k}\times\hat{k}\right)=\hat{i}+0=\hat{i} </script></span>&nbsp;<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৮]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কৌণিক বেগ</p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভরবেগ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কৌণিক ত্বরণ&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কাজ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কৌণিক বেগ, কৌণিক ত্বরণ হলো অক্ষীয় ভেক্টর।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.233em; left: 0.093em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.18em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.099em, 1001.55em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -3.367em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.817em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-649"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-650"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-651"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-653"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-654"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-655"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.549em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.278em; left: 0.093em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.321em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-657" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.18em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-658" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-659"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-660"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-661"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.503em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.233em; left: 0.093em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.321em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.18em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-664"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-665"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-666" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.73em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.733em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.558em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>η</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm \hat{\eta}=\frac{\vec{A}.\vec{B}}{|\vec{A}.\vec{B}|} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.141em, 1000.91em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-720"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-722"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-723"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-724"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.503em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.23em, 4.374em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0.093em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">j</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.37em, 3.6em, -999.998em); top: -4.278em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.503em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm 4\hat{j} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: দুটি ভেক্টর পরস্পর লম্ব হলে তাদের ডট গুণফল শূন্য।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪,৯৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm \vec{A}.\vec{B}.\vec{C}=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>X-Z তলে একটি বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="width: 6.15em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="width: 8.973em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯১]</p>

                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>লন রোলারের ক্ষেত্রে কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টানা ও ঠেলা উভয় সহজ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্কেলার গুণফলের উদাহরণ কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সরণ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দ্রুতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>স্থিতিশক্তি</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টর্ক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কাজ, স্থিতিশক্তি, বৈদ্যুতিক বিভব ইত্যাদি ভেক্টর রাশির স্কেলার গুণফলের উদাহরণ।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: &nbsp;রৈখিক ভরবেগের একক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="width: 3.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.62em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-988"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-992"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-994"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-995"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm kgms^{-1}</script></span>।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৬]</p>
</span>

                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো একটি নদীতে একটি দাঁড়ের নৌকার বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="width: 5.069em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.137em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.14em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-999"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1004"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.529em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.56em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1006"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1007"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>12</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm 12\ kmh^{-1}</script></span> এবং স্রোতের বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="width: 4.473em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.653em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.65em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1011"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1016"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.529em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.56em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1018"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1019"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\rm 6\ kmh^{-1}</script></span> হলে নৌকাটি কত কোণে সোজা অপর পাড়ে পৌঁছাবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>120°</p>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>60°</p>
</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>120</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="width: 13.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1010.74em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1023"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1030"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1032" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1035"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">120</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1042"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1043"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>120</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm cos\alpha=-\frac{6}{12}=-\frac{1}{2}\therefore\alpha=120°&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
