                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুই বা ততোধিক ভেক্টর যদি সমান্তরালে ক্রিয়া করে তাহলে তাদেরকে কি বলে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সরণ ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিপ্রতীপ ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমরেখ ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমতলীয় ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: দুই বা ততোধিক ভেক্টর একই তলে অবস্থান করলে, তাদেরকে সমতলীয় ভেক্টর বলে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুইটি ভেক্টর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="width: 0.933em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.747em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.12em, 1000.71em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1046"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1047"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1048"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1049"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.747em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.283em; left: 0.151em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.259em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">\rm \vec{A}</script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="width: 0.859em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.71em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.157em, 1000.63em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1053"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1055"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1056"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.71em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.63em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.246em; left: 0.151em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.259em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\rm \vec{B}</script></span> এর মান যথাক্রমে 5 ও 6 একক, এরা কোনো বিন্দুতে 60° কোণে ক্রিয়াশীল, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.684em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.12em, 1002.61em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1060"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1061"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1062"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1063"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.747em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.283em; left: 0.151em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.259em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1068"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1069"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.71em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.63em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.246em; left: 0.151em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="width: 18.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1015.04em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1091"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1092"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1093"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1094"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1099"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1100"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1119"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1120"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1124"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1125"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm \vec{A}\times\vec{B}=ABsin\theta=5\times6\times sin60°=15 \sqrt3&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ঘাত বলের মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="width: 3.814em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1169"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1170" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1173"><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪৯]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সবচেয়ে শক্তিশালী বল হচ্ছে-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মহাকর্ষ বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িৎ চুম্বকীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সবল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দুর্বল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সবলতার তুলনা: মহাকর্ষ বল → 1; দুর্বল নিউক্লীয় বল → <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="width: 1.764em;                                 <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>980 N ওজনের একটি বস্তুকে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="width: 3.318em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.722em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.72em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1211"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1214"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1216"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1217"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm 1ms^{-2}</script></span> ত্বরণ দিতে কত বল প্রয়োগ করতে হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="width: 15.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(4.059em, 1012.91em, 8.199em, -999.998em); top: -4.875em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1221"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.953em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1003.69em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(2.994em, 1011.48em, 4.633em, -999.998em); top: -2.498em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1231" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">980</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1012.91em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -0.9em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.879em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>980</mn><mn>9.8</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm W = mg \\ \Rightarrow m=\frac{W}{g}=\frac{980}{9.8}=100\ kg&nbsp;\\ \therefore\ F=ma=100\times1=100\ N&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৬২]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রৈখিক ত্বরণ (a) ও কৌণিক ত্বরণের <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="width: 1.753em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1001.31em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1258"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">(\alpha)</script></span> সম্পর্ক-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.689em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.69em, 2.735em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1263"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="padding-left: 0.276em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.594em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.28em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.134em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.41em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.225em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.59em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.594em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi>α</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm a=\frac{r}{\alpha} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="width: 3.281em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৫]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ঘড়ির সেকেন্ডের কাঁটার কৌণিক কম্পাঙ্ক কত হবে?</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>60</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="width: 4.784em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1334"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1335"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>60</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1347" style="width: 11.068em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1348"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1352"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1353" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1357" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1358"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1370"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1372"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1373"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>60</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\rm \omega=\frac{2\pi}{T}=\frac{2\pi}{60}=\frac{\pi}{30}\ rads^{-1}&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৩]</p>
</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৫৬]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কৌণিক ত্বরণের একক নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ঘূর্ণায়মান বস্তুর ভর 2 kg। ঘূর্ণন অক্ষ থেকে এর দূরত্ব 1m। বস্তুটি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="width: 4.361em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.579em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.58em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1445"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1451"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1453"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1454"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm 5\ rads^{-1}</script></span> কৌণিক বেগে ঘুরলে এর ঘূর্ণন গতিশক্তি নির্ণয় কর।</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

E=\frac{1}{2}I\omega^2=\frac{1}{2}\times2\times5^2=25\ J&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৩]</p>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি লম্ব অক্ষ উপপাদ্য?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Fusion</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Separation<b> </b></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Combination অর্থ সংমিশ্রণ এর antonym হলো Separation যার অর্থ পৃথকীকরণ। অপরদিকে Mixture অর্থ মিশ্রণ, Aggregate অর্থ সমষ্টি, Fusion অর্থ একীকরণ।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>______ among you are from Class XII?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Which</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Who</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Whom</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Whose<b> </b></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে শব্দের অবস্থান অনুযায়ী, আমরা Subject বসাবো, তাই Who ব্যবহার করা হয়েছে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>We invested it <u>ourselves</u>. Here “ourselves” is an example of-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Reflexive Pronoun</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Reciprocal Pronoun</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Indefinite Pronoun</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Distributive Pronoun</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Reflexive pronouns are words like myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, yourselves, themselves.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হোসেন শহীদ সোহরাওয়ার্দী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>এ. কে. ফজলুল হক</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তিতুমীর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ফরায়েজী আন্দোলনের প্রধান কেন্দ্র ছিল ফরিদপুর জেলায়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 50 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘ছিয়াত্তরের মন্বন্তর’ বাংলার কত সনে হয়েছিল?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাংলা ১০৭৬ সালে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                        </div>

                                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ইংরেজি সাল ছিল ১৭৭০ খ্রিস্টাব্দ।</p>

        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">MCQ Master Set: 2 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি অদিক রাশি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সরণ, বেগ, ত্বরণ, ওজন হলো দিক রাশি।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৫]</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: যে ভেক্টরের মান শূন্য এবং যার কোনো নির্দিষ্ট দিক থাকে না, তাকে নাল বা শূন্য ভেক্টর বলে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৮]</p>
</span>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.283em; left: 0.188em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em;
