padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">6</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-38"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-39"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-40"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.26em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.114em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">3</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-45"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-46"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-47"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.23em, 4.324em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.114em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">j</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">9</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-52"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-53"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-54"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.523em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.246em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \vec{Q}=6\hat{i}-3\hat{j}-9\hat{k}</script></span>&nbsp;পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে m এর মান নির্ণয় কর?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="width: 16.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1013.03em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-62"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-63"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-69"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-74"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-77"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-87"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm \frac{2}{6}=\frac{m}{-3}=\frac{-3}{-9}\Rightarrow\frac{1}{3}=\frac{m}{-3}\Rightarrow m=-1 </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭২]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="width: 16.433em; position: relative; width: 0.747em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.246em; left: 0.151em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.259em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm \left(\vec{P}+\vec{Q}\right)+\vec{R}=\vec{P}+\left(\vec{Q}+\vec{R}\right); </script></span> এটি ভেক্টরের কোন সূত্র?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৩]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="width: 0.822em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="width: 4.556em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \vec{P}.\vec{Q}=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="width: 0.699em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm \vec{P}</script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-238"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-239"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm \vec{P}.\vec{Q}=0</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৮]<br>
&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="width: 10.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1008.57em, 3.568em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-317"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-318"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm \left(\hat{j}\times\hat{k}\right)\times\hat{i}=\hat{i}\times\hat{i}=0 </script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৮]</p>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="width: 0.598em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mover><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="width: 2.461em; top: -4.643em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style=""><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.005em; left: -0.043em;"><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.005em; left: 0.139em;"><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">→</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.73em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.733em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.386em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>.</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></mrow><mover><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm \frac{\overrightarrow a .\overrightarrow b}{\overrightarrow {|a|}}</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>

style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm \vec{\nabla}.\vec{r}=\left(\frac{d}{dx}\hat{i}+\frac{d}{dy}\hat{j}+\frac{d}{dz}\hat{k}\right).\left(x\hat{i}+y\hat{j}+z\hat{k}\right)=\left(1+1+1\right)=3</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.278em; left: 0.139em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-582"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-583"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.776em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.324em; left: 0.184em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="padding-left: 0.276em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-588"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-589"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন ভেক্টরটি X অক্ষের সমান্তরাল?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="width: 6.423em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কাজ, স্থিতিশক্তি, বৈদ্যুতিক বিভব ইত্যাদি ভেক্টর রাশির স্কেলার গুণফলের উদাহরণ।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="width: 2.507em;                                                 <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮১]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="width: 3.653em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="width: 3.653em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="width: 15.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1012.99em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-840"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-848" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-852" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-854" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-856"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-857"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-860"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-862"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-863"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-869"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-870"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\rm tan\theta=\frac{6}{6}=1\therefore\theta=\tan^{-1}{\left(1\right)}=45°. </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুই বা ততোধিক ভেক্টর যদি একই তলে অবস্থান করে তাহলে তাদেরকে কি বলে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সরণ ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিপ্রতীপ ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমরেখ ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমতলীয় ভেক্টর</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: দুই বা ততোধিক ভেক্টর যদি সমান্তরাল ক্রিয়া করে তাদেরকে সমরেখ ভেক্টর বলে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুইটি ভেক্টর রাশির মান যথাক্রমে 8 ও 6 একক এরা পরস্পরের সাথে 30° কোণে ক্রিয়া করে, এদের ভেক্টর গুণফল কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="width: 16.969em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৭]</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-928"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-929"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-930" style="font-size: 70.7%; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-932" style="width: 3.964em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বলের ঘাতের মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="width: 3.814em;                                             <span>Question 24 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের বলগুলোর মধ্যে কোনটি সবচেয়ে দুর্বল?</p>

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িৎ চৌম্বকীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সবল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দুর্বল নিউক্লীয় বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: শক্তিশালী বলের ক্রম: সবল নিউক্লীয় &gt; তড়িৎ চৌম্বকীয় &gt; দুর্বল নিউক্লীয় &gt; মহাকর্ষীয় বল।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪২]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বল 4 kg ভরের স্থির বস্তুর উপর ক্রিয়া করায় বস্তুটি 6 সেকেন্ডে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>30</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="width: 4.249em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>30</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>120</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="width: 18.527em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-982" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.38em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.227em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-983"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.584em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.99em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">120</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>30</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>120</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm F=ma=\frac{m\left(v-u\right)}{t}=\frac{4\times\left(30-0\right)}{6}=\frac{120}{6}=20\ N </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪৬]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কৌণিক ভরবেগ ও কৌণিক বেগের মধ্যে সম্পর্ক কোনটি?</p>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="width: 3.645em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.962em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.96em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1015"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">I</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi>ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\rm L=I\omega </script></span></p>

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৭]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>হাত ঘড়ির মিনিটের কাটার কৌণিক কম্পাঙ্ক কত হবে?</p>
