                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>3600</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>1800</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="width: 12.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.961em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.96em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1100"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1104"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1110"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1800</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1121"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1123"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1124"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3600</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>1800</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\rm \omega=\frac{2\pi}{T}=\frac{2\pi}{3600}=\frac{\pi}{1800}rads^{-1} </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি কৌণিক বেগের একক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="width: 2.871em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭২]</p>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ভরকেন্দ্রগামী লম্ব অক্ষের সাপেক্ষে বৃত্তাকার চাকতির চক্রগতির ব্যাসার্ধ কত?</p>

margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.28em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.134em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1183" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1184" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.447em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\rm \frac{r}{3} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 36 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি চাকার ভর 5 kg এবং কোন অক্ষের সাপেক্ষে চক্রগতির ব্যাসার্ধের মান 0.2 m। চাকাটিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1185" style="width: 4.361em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.579em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.58em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1186"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1192"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1194"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1195"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm 2\ rads^{-2} </script></span> কৌণিক ত্বরণ সৃষ্টি করতে কত টর্ক দিতে হবে?&nbsp;</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1198" style="width: 14.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1011.56em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1199"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1203"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1205" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1209" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.97em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1210"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.051em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1220"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\rm I=mr^2=5\times\left(0.2\right)^2=0.2\ kgm^2 </script></span></p>

<p>টক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C4;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.55em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1224"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">τ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">I</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>τ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\rm \tau=I\alpha=0.2\times2=0.4\ Nm</script></span><br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮২]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 37 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি সমান্তরাল অক্ষ উপপাদ্য?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="width: 5.558em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>I, she and you ate snacks.</p>
</label>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এই ধরনের&nbsp;sentence এ ২৩১ এই সিরিয়ালটি মাথায় রাখতে হবে। Second person, third person and first person.</p>
</span>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>The synonym of ‘Commemorate’ is -</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Overlook</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Durable</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Observe</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Assert</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Commemorate অর্থ স্মরণ করা এর&nbsp;synonym হলো Observe বা পর্যবেক্ষণ করা। অরপদিকে Overlook অর্থ উপেক্ষা করা; Durable অর্থ মজবুত এবং assert অর্থ প্রমাণ করা।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                </div>

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ফকির মজনু শাহ - ফকির-সন্ন্যাসী আন্দোলনের প্রধান নেতা;<br>
হাজী শরিয়তউল্লাহ - ফরায়েজী আন্দোলনের প্রবক্তা।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২৩ জুন, ১৭৫৭</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২৫ জুন, ১৭৫৭</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>২২ জুন, ১৭৫৭</p>
</label>

                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

            </div>
